name: transfer
description: An event-driven backend system for securely transferring files between users, inspired by services like WeTransfer.   The system uses **direct-to-S3 uploads**, **asynchronous malware scanning**, and **event-driven architecture** to safely deliver files without handling file contents on the backend.

scripts.package:deps: mkdir -p layer/nodejs && cp package.json layer/nodejs/ && cp -r yarn.lock layer/nodejs/ && cd layer/nodejs/ && yarn --production --frozen-lockfile
